Today, the North East is firing with 5 ft @ 8s N swell and fresh 16 mph WNW winds. Saltburn Point and Saltburn Beach are your best bets, especially around their optimal tides. Tomorrow, swell drops slightly to 4 ft @ 8s NNE with a moderate 15 mph S wind, still offering fun conditions at spots like Redcar and Hartlepool. By the day after, it eases down to 2 ft @ 10s NNE, providing mellow, clean waves at various beaches. Best: today.
